data.actual_result: You gonna see different modes, as shown in attachments. I did censor some things what I don't want to show with others.
data.short_description: Stream Purple icon is not showing on DM selection after person is streaming. It's only showing in friend list.
data.steps_to_repro: - Ask someone to turn on stream mode.  - Then go in dm with him on iOS and you gonna see green thing but it need to be purple because his streaming and not being online only.  - Then go to friend list and you gonna see icon saying streaming and purple icon instead of green one.
